abstract: Community Service Society, one of eight organizations supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, has partnered with Retired and Senior Volunteer Program to pair older adult mentors with struggling students throughout New York City as part of MentorCHIP program.

headline.print_headline: Serving as a Role Model During a Father’s Absence
headline.main: A Role Model and Mentor While Dad Serves Time

keywords.value: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
keywords.name: organizations

keywords.value: Community Service Society of New York
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: Richard Washington is mentoring Jaylen Williams, whose father is incarcerated. Without a father at home, children like Jaylen are more likely to struggle in school or even drop out....
lead_paragraph: Richard Washington is mentoring Jaylen Williams, whose father is incarcerated. Without a father at home, children like Jaylen are more likely to struggle in school or even drop out.
